interface.name: phosh_private
interface.description: Private protocol between phosh and the compositor. This is a minimal version containing only the shell state signaling.

request.name: set_shell_state
request.description: This allows the shell to report its current state. This can e.g. be used to notify the compositor that the shell is up.
